mi:PackageInformation.name: Orckestra.Lists.FAQ
mi:PackageInformation.author: Orckestra A/S
mi:PackageInformation.Description: Allows visitors to browse useful information as a list of questions and answers (FAQ)
mi:PackageInformation.TechnicalDetails: Stores FAQ items in a global data type. Implements a list of items and an item detailed view as a Razor function. Requires Bootstrap and Jquery.
